parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns description of map sign mouse cursor is over. Works with in-game map as well as 2D editor map in edit mode. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlMapMouseOver''' control </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - map control  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - Possible values:
* ["unit", [[Object]]]
* ["vehicle", [[Object]]]
* ["vehicleGroup", [[Object]]]
* ["object", [[Object]]]
* ["waypoint", [[Waypoint]]]
* ["trigger", [[Object]]]
* ["marker", [[String]]]
* ["task", [[Task]]]
* ["customMark"] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>
([[uiNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "_map") [[ctrlMapCursor]] ["Track","HC_overFriendly"];

_mouseover = [[if]] ([[count]] ([[ctrlMapMouseOver]] (uiNamespace getVariable "_map")) > 0) [[then]]
{
	[[ctrlMapMouseOver]] ([[uiNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "_map")
}
[[else]]
{
	[""]
};

[[if]] (_mouseover [[select]] 0 [[==]] "task" [[&&]] [[str]](_logic [[getVariable]] "onTaskAssigned") != [[str]]{}) [[then]]
{
	//--- Task
	([[uiNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "_map") [[ctrlMapCursor]] ["Track","HC_overMission"];
}
else
{
	//--- Waypoint
	([[uiNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "_map") [[ctrlMapCursor]] ["Track","HC_move"];
};
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[onEachFrame]] {[[hintSilent]] [[str]] [[ctrlMapMouseOver]] ([[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51)};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[findDisplay]], [[displayCtrl]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
